description: A test case file `testcases/<UUID>.json` as part of an evidence package.

title.description: The title of the test case

execution_datetime.description: The date and time of the execution of this test case starting.

passed.description: The state of the test case

items.description: A piece of evidence as part of this test case.

kind.description: The type of data stored. Note that where `Http` is used, a Record Separator character (0x1e) can be used to split the request and response portion.

value.description: Either `plain:` followed by plain text, `media:` followed by a media SHA256 hash, or `base64:` followed by a base64 string of data without padding.

caption.description: An optional caption for this piece of evidence.

original_filename.description: The original filename for File evidence
